website_summaries.verdict: The Kyocera Hydro Edge is a decent Android smartphone for Boost Mobile customers, but aside from its rugged and waterproof design, it's merely average.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if Amazon or Kyocera
customer_reviews.text: But my phone heats up to where it's impossible to even touch it when on GPS or talking after alittle while (15 minutes). After a while of this the processor (where the heat is coming from) seems to of melted itself and now it runs slower. I want either a replacement or want to go to a new phone. I saw alot of people complaining about this already so I think its a known issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Austin Addison

customer_reviews.title: THIS PHONE CAME SUPER FAST IN THE MAIL WAS BY FAR ADSPECTING IT ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS PHONE CAME SUPER FAST IN THE MAIL WAS BY FAR ADSPECTING IT TODAY BUT WHEN I WALKED OUT SIDE HAD A NICE SUPRISE WAITING FOR ME.. CAME WITH IN THREE DAYS OF PURCHASE I WOULD DEFF 100% RECOMEND ANY PHONE FROM THIS SELLER OR ANY PRODUCT IT HAS ALOT OF FEATURES FAST TURN ON AN VERY EASY TO USE THANK YOU AGAIN FOR THE PHONE AND THE KILLER PRICE AN LIGHING SHIPPING OTHER WISE THIS KIND OF FAST SHIPPING WOULD OF CAUST ME OVER 20$
customer_reviews.author: T.j.

customer_reviews.title: Cool little phone.
customer_reviews.text: I use this phone for things like Swagbucks and PerkTV. It ran videos for a week strait while I was out of town. As a waterproof, cheap phone, this has many uses. I have used to to take pictures while tubing, swimming, and being around water in general. As far as using it as a regular phone, i have not activated it or used it for calls or texts. This phone should stand up to whatever you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: My first  "smart phone"
customer_reviews.text: It's smarter than I!! Every day I click on another button to find out what it does. I was having trouble seeing images & page 2. I found out (from a kid) it did not come with with an Adobe Reader. Once I downloaded it (free) it seems to work ok so far. At my age I'm still learning "How To". I really liked the idea of "water proof" as I have a pool, and work in the yard. I already dumped some dirt on it. I just took off the case, washed it & wiped down the phone. Ask me in six months, I may have a different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MARY P.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't own it long...
customer_reviews.text: ... but while I did, it was a spiffy little device. I'd intended to buy this and port it to Ting Wireless but sadly, Sprint (who owns Boost) does not allow Boost Mobile phones to leave Boost at this time... contractual issue... That is the ONLY reason I'm docking a star. For the price, the phone was quick and responsive and honestly, if I needed a simple off-contract wi-fi enabled camera/GPS/MP3 player, this is where I'd start. Only played with it for a couple hours but it was impressive while I had it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for someone is not technology savvy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mom and I like it! Major upgrade from her Samsung prevail.I have the Samsung galaxy 3 and this phone obviously is not as fast and updated but it works good. Quick enough for my mom's needs. She only uses it to play candy crush and make calls lol. Plus, I got it on sale for only $50! Its a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Nadesico2823

customer_reviews.title: Strong, But high radiation/over heating
customer_reviews.text: Good quality phone but suffers from (what appears to be) bit rot quickly, and has high radiation It's extremely durable I've owned 3 and I was very brutal with them all they lasted longer then I'd expect such an inexpensive phone too.
customer_reviews.author: Blake H

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone and the price is right.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Samsung Galaxy S2 and I even like this phone better than the Samsung. The Jelly Bean compared to the Ice Cream Android is much faster and the touch response of this phone is much better. There are more sounds to use on this phone. Downloading on this phone is faster than my previous phone. This is a great phone for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Aloysius A. Korenkiewicz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality - great deal of storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone, not worse than comparable Samsung or Motorola - considering I paid $50 with no shipping or tax - this feels like a $200+ smartphone. Much better than my old Samsung Galaxy & a great deal for the money - if I were drop it anytime, its cheap to replace!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Haven't had many issues with it. Easy to operate. Like the apps it came with. The only issue I've had is that occasionally the keyboard locks up and doesn't work. But the awesome fact is I got the phone for 50 less than any store had it for. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: calliediva

customer_reviews.title: This phone Met my Husbands expectation.
customer_reviews.text: The Cell phone arrived before promised date. My husband is very pleased with the condition(new) I purchased this phone for 100.00 less than I would have paid at the Boost store. I would strongly recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Driver

customer_reviews.title: Durable but basic
customer_reviews.text: Pretty low amounts of internal memory and preloaded with bloatware, which GREATLY impacts how many/how large of apps you can install. Sound quality, signal strength, waterproofing, strength are all acceptable. I have two toddlers and do a lot of gardening, so mine takes a beating but keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: If you need a phone that you can pretty much treat like crap and count on it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone and it had a rough life. It kept on ticking. If you need a phone that you can pretty much treat like crap and count on it to still work, this will be the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Cathyrine Pili Bjorgo

customer_reviews.title: No sim slot
customer_reviews.text: The phone is nice,fanciful ànd durable but it has no sim slot. Tried using it in Nigeria but there is no sim slot. How do i go about it as i am currently residing in Nigeria. Can it be changed to one with sim slot?Also, is it locked to àny network?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone....so far
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective. Amazon quickly replaced with another that is working fine. You really can't beat this phone for the price. Battery life not great so keep charger handy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't locked up yet, spilled/splashed/showered/dunked and it's still running, even a few drops and no cracks/stracthes in screen, although power button isn't as responsive now.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in Classic Flavor

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: awsome phone quick shipping and defiantly waterproof i use it in the bath lol .. I really like this phone... works just as good as my expensive htc i used to have
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my child it's a good phone for a kid I wouldn't recommend for a grown up
customer_reviews.author: anthony smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to replace my wife's cell phone when it had decided to commit suicide by leaping into a pail of water. I don't think you could find better value for the money on a cell phone of this type. It doesn't have the biggest, best looking screen or the fastest operation, but it gets the job done, and best of all will withstand getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: troychicali

customer_reviews.title: Rubbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst of worst phone that i have ever purchased in my life, the phone comes on but the screen is blank, really dont know what to do with it, upset on my money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works, but slow
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who requires waterproof phone at the fire house. Its only 3g. Runs slow. He's not thrilled - but it works. Haven't needed to test waterproofing yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been using this phone a couple months now. It's a relief not to be getting butt raped by verizon anymore. This phone is excellent, my boyfriend is about to purchase the exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: great phone for being waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for people who want a rugged phone that's decently fast. Good for social media and talking and texting. Not so good for gaming. Got here fast. So all around it's a good phone that you don't have to worry about dropping it in the water because its waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: kelly oliver

customer_reviews.title: This sucks.. the battery was swollen and phone didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This sucks..the battery was swollen and phone didn't make it pass the first screen.returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Toriey

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Hi phone is very nice its responsive its fairly fast but the one thing i don't like about it that the back design is really ugly it looks cheap and sorta like a toy phone but that simple imperfection won't stop me from giving the phone 5 stars because it can easily be fixed by putting a case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr2kElite

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: it's okay but I couldn't hear nothing out of the phone
customer_reviews.author: brittney smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! No reason to get an expensive phone, this does everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I have chosen this rating because I had the model before this one n it worked good now this updated version works great the shipping was fast n the price was cheap
customer_reviews.author: michael lloyd

customer_reviews.title: The Hydro Edge is TOO large for my hands.
customer_reviews.text: I did not use Boost Mobile and/or the Hydro Edge (Boost Mobile) phone. The smartphone is rather large and cumbersome for a person with small hands.
customer_reviews.author: RedBlackWidow

customer_reviews.title: ... my boyfriend for 40$ and he loves it it's like brand new fast shipping very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refurbished for my boyfriend for 40$ and he loves it it's like brand new fast shipping very happy!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not unlocket because work whit boost mobile operator, no work in Venezuela
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Own the phone love it got one for my mom for Xmas. She loves it and so will you durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: its a very decent phone
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty decent , the speed of the phone from a 1-5 is a 4 and I give the phone a 4 its lacks a front camera ... you know people love selfies (: ,but no its reccomendable
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the Hydro Edge. I did have to exchange it because of speaker issues. But for the most part It seems to be working good. I have only had the replacement for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Bad sell
customer_reviews.text: This phone completely blanked out ! It lights up but the screen is black ! How can we fix this if not can we return it as this time it's been about 1month and a half
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything on this phone worked good & it was as decribed
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 mo a piece of junk then when i tryed to have it fixed well thats another story
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good phone had it for a long time now and its still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: i got it for the low
customer_reviews.text: I got it for 49.99.....brand new, need I say more? It's a good phone too. Waterproof, ok camera. All around B-C+ kinda phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and does exactly what its suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: jamal austin

customer_reviews.title: **Hard to hear*
customer_reviews.text: 3 days with phone so far and works good. Works good if you don't want to talk on the phone. The earpiece speaker is terrible and tinny sounding. The outside speakerphone works great, but I don't want everyone hearing my conversations all the time. So any of the reviews you read on this is probably true. Not sure how long I will tolerate straining to listen to someone trying to talk to me. Last two phones I had of course didn't have this problem, but others that this phone does take care of. Hard to find the "perfect" one.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle

customer_reviews.title: love !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as a gift for my boyfriend, he really had his heart set on an I phone , but I got him this because it had the same sleek look and is a smart phone (which is really all he cared about) and he absolutely loves it !!!! I have the HTC one on a Sprint plan and honestly I am thinking about buying out of my contract and getting the same phone !!(:
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Myers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: completely unable to unlock kyocera phone & Boost was equally uncooperative.
customer_reviews.author: eric stephens

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. It is easy to operate and I love the apps. Phone is lightweight and not bulky. Great service coverage
customer_reviews.author: Valarie House

customer_reviews.title: Wow !
customer_reviews.text: This phone is honestly.. amazing! I wasn't going to get it because all of the bad reviews, but I loovvee it! Just like an iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Donahue

customer_reviews.title: dont listen to people that say this phone is slow
customer_reviews.text: i thougth this phone going to be slow because it was only sixty dollars but i was wrong this phone is super fast!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nayem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the phone with no problem, works great, brand new in the box. I love it. It was also very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Meyo

customer_reviews.title: ... my bf as a bday present and it's a pretty good phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bf as a bday present and it's a pretty good phone! I was shocked to see that they have a prepaid phone this good lol.
customer_reviews.author: Destinie Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Phone did not work at all. I returned the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Webster

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great phone no problems at all with this phone and at boost its 40 bucks a month un limited for all
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been an excellent phone, it gives me what I need at this time.I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: outstanding phone
customer_reviews.text: i love the phone and the price for it. allows me to get into the smartphone technolgy at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K Cyr

customer_reviews.title: KYOCERA HYDRO EDGE  ( BOAST MOBILE ) CELL PHONE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY INITIAL PURCHASE OF A KYOCERA CELL PHONE AND I AM VERY PLEASED WITH IT'S PERFORMANCE. I LOVE THE SIZE OF IT, NOT TOO LARGE OR SMALL, AND THE COMFORTABLE FEEL OF IT. THE LARGE SIZE OF THE LETTERS AND NUMBERS MAKE IT IDEAL FOR ME. THIS SMART PHONE IS FULLY EQUIPED FOR ALL OF MY NEEDS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just recieved mine TODAY....love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not a GREAT phone but its perfect for beginners (like me) .. fast, simple and fun. The camera is amazing...sharp, clear and even has a selection of different effects. Internet speed was the icing on the cake,for me:). I ordered on December 28 (49.99) and recieved it December 31....Fast! (One day shipment)....Overall im a happy customer....
customer_reviews.author: Miss King

customer_reviews.title: kyocera hydo edge
customer_reviews.text: For the money paid was excellent choice. Only real drawback is the speaker mode it picksup alot of background noise and the screen is very sensitive. And makes unwanted calls but overall I'm very satisfied with your performance all the features wifi apps so for the money I'm very overly satisfied with your performance of the phone
customer_reviews.author: vincent rice

customer_reviews.title: wish it was better quality...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is supposed to be rated for a 4ft drop crack proof screen, but my brand new phone falling from a foot felland the screen shattered...
customer_reviews.author: datboyhsh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better condition that I thought it would be in at such a great price!!Love this phone!!
customer_reviews.author: michael williams

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Hydro Edge (Boost Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: it has every thing I need on it It works great I AM please with it it dose good on all things I need
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH BAUCOM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was not a 4g phone only 3g wouldn't work with my plan. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAS REFURBISHED but not advertised as such
customer_reviews.text: You want to know when you find out that a phone is refurbished? I'll tell you how, as it's happened to me TWICE now. One day a calendar reminder pops up saying, "____________ Birthday" or "______________ party" and it's for someone you do not know. You open it and some random guy's email address is attached. That is precisely what happened to me with this phone. However, it was too late to return it. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: no front camera
customer_reviews.text: No front camera but over all its a good phone it does everything I need it to do😊😊love it just needs a front facing camera
customer_reviews.author: shaniece

customer_reviews.title: This telephone is good if you're completely broke and you need to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: This telephone is good if you're completely broke and you need to replace your phone for telephone calls or text messages only
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Phone Issues
customer_reviews.text: My phone makes a loud noise while on the call. I called boost mobile and they troubleshoot with me. They told me that it was defect of the phone and I need to call manufacture. But I am unhappy with the thought I just purchase it and I already have issues that I'm stuck with.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: phone,only good at one thing,water proof.everything else,I leave it up to your immagination..
customer_reviews.text: What a horrible experiance..never again kyocera..I can explain this phone in one simple word..primitive non function phone, I would not recomend this phone to anyone, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Park

customer_reviews.title: A waterproof camera with cloud backup (Phone? What phone?)
customer_reviews.text: I've never used this device as phone. For me, it's waterproof camera with cloud backup (thru OneDrive or Google Photos) over wifi. I love being able to take it kayaking or use it to capture photos from the water. I've fully submerged it with no ill effects. The only problem? It will try to find a network even without a SIM card in it when I start it, making me hit the camera button. I don't consider this a phone, so it'd be nice if it stopped trying to be one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for men who work outdoors
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in the gas and oil industry. He has gone through a lot of phones in the past. This phone is the second Kyocera hydro he has had. Its a nice big phone, and its very sturdy. He is constantly getting dirty, wet, cold, oily and this phone is still kicking. We bought a rubberized case for it, which also helps, especially with grip. They phone runs fast and smooth and the picture is vivid and clear. Good video quality, great camera. Overall a great phone, and perfect for men with dirty jobs!
customer_reviews.author: danikytn80

customer_reviews.title: havent been able to activate yet but if i can i will give more stars
customer_reviews.text: i havent been able to activate it yet and a lot of desired apps dont seem to work for it but once i get the phone activated and OS up to date perhaps the apps will work on it that i want
customer_reviews.author: Proud7thDayAdventist19

customer_reviews.title: These Boost Edges are great and seem to be indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item because the description was unclear. Was sent the older model instead of what was listed in the description. These Boost Edges are great and seem to be indestructible. My boyfriend has not been able to crack or break it yet! He works construction and has gone through four phones in one year! But wish it was the model we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: netters

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I brought the phone in Feb. and here it is April and the sound on the phone is gone. The phone doesn't play music, doesn't ring, no microphone. Called boost mobile CS and was told to call Kyocera. Called Kyocera and was told to ship phone at my cost to them. The process would take 7 to 10 days. They would then contact me to say if they will fix at their cost or at mine after inspecting the phone. I asked what am I to do with no phone, was told to see what boost mobile can do. Went to a boost mobile store, was told they don't do loaner phones. So I would suggest go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: ttl

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Dropped it one time and the whole screen shattered and went black. Going back to my regular Kyocera Hydro, as it is tough and never let me down. Buy the Kyocera Hydro Edge if you are graceful, the clumsy like me cannot own it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Cox

customer_reviews.title: ... storage on this phone but it has been a good phone. No problems with workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of storage on this phone but it has been a good phone. No problems with workmanship. Just cant update what I need to because it is out of storage.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY RAMETTA

customer_reviews.title: price is right for a boost phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a year now and like it. I upgraded to this from kyocera hydro, that froze all the time. The Hydro edge has only let me down once. The first I bought power bottom broke off after 3mo. The 2nd one has been a good phone. It's not the best phone out there but for a boost phone the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the $
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a prepaid android phone for my kids. This one is reasonably priced and works great for the cost. They can play all their games and apps. Added bonus, phone is water resistant. My son is very hard on phones so this is an added bonus. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone, with a couple of "buts"
customer_reviews.text: I dumped AT&T after many years when they arbitrarily raised my monthly charges by 50%. Got this phone because the specs sounded good. I have no regrets whatsoever. Does everything I need to do. Only complaints are: call quality sometimes sounds like my caller is gargling - underwater; battery has gone flat (seemingly) in twenty minutes (happened once, yesterday). For $55/month, soon to be$50/month, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: soggy merkin

customer_reviews.title: 1 Con makes noise when you press start to recording and pics
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect i only txt call. I did try games like nfs most wanted no lag. I try to capture a funny video but it makes noise so i cant. I did try the battery out I only have to charge it ones a day on a heavy use. It takes 2 hours to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Seiko Pina

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Kyocera Hydro Edge (Boost Mobile) purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can't be more pleased with the Kyocera Hydro Edge I bought here on Amazon as an upgrade to the Kyocera Hydro... Price was great !!! and 3 months later I'm still very happy with the Kyocera Hydro Edge smartphone... as well as Boost Mobile...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great price also
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a birthday present for my son. He is totally enjoying his phone. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: foofoo

customer_reviews.title: Good first time smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars if there were a front facing camera. Also GPS is very slow. But not bad for the price. Its a smart phone. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cooling_Tech

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being one of my favorite phones, I love the waterproof factor, and it's pretty easy to figure out and navigate as smart phones go. It could use more in phone memory though, not many apps can fit, it wasn't as bad with a micro SD card though. I like the set up alot, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! So easy to read the screen and easy to operate. Runs so much faster than the phone I was using. Light weight and I love the photo editing software it comes with
customer_reviews.author: JodiPember

customer_reviews.title: problems with Kyocera Hydro Edge
customer_reviews.text: the (back button) does not seem to want to work. You have to hit it repetitively. that in itself is irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Zanoni

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This phone has died after my daughter had it for less than 6 months. First, the power button was sluggish. Then for 4 days, the power button didn't work. Now the screen is blank. I thought this phone would be better than the Kyocera Hydro she had previously, which also broke down. But obviously not. Switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone great deal
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very nice watertight and large display, has all the functions of much more expensive phones. Was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: remmahjp

customer_reviews.title: poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: I owned the orginal hydro and loved it. When I got my new hydro edge it came in a beat mailing envelope with little to no padding. After hooking up a week ago the speaker on the handset has static during every phone call and people have trouble hearing me. Also the memory card is difficult to remove
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: it need better keybotd and more internal
customer_reviews.text: so I ccant talk on the phone while it on my shoulde, it need better keybotd and more internal memory
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: not good battery
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone except I have to keep charging it to much and sometimes I wake up to a dead phone just don't understand that's only flaw I have found so far but not happy of it..
customer_reviews.author: tracy Davis

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't allow me to keep writing text when a ...
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't allow me to keep writing text when a text message comes and closes out the entire texting window if it wasn't for that this phone would have gotten 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: renae ferrell

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have upgraded to this phone and so far so good im very pleased, I purchased it used got a great deal I cant complain, you guys always seem to please your customers.
customer_reviews.author: latoya hickman

customer_reviews.title: very happy Kyocera owner
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. The size is perfect. Fits in my pocket and purse great. I have had Boost Mobile for a few years and this is the best phone for the best price.
customer_reviews.author: rosebud75

customer_reviews.title: I was never gonna activate the Boost service....
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone purely for its Wi-Fi capabilities. It works very well in that capacity. I live in a very humid climate. My last android phone (HTC-MyTouch) bit the dust because of the humidity here, and salt air. I hoping to get some mileage out of this phone. The only app I was not able to download, was the NBC App. It has something to do with the version of software on this phone. Otherwise I have made internet phone calls, and used it greatly for its media capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: HSouixZ

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone does the trick,I have my apps and txtng and phone calls are no issue.The setup of everything is simple and clear.After a while it starts to not work as properly but that's any phone you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Xio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Kyocera Hydro Edge very quickly! I love it ! I am known to have my cell phone around water! Trust me it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Best phone yet
customer_reviews.text: i can't believe i got this phone for 50$ its worth at lease 150 this is a great phone hands down
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Burton

customer_reviews.title: best phone ;) *****
customer_reviews.text: This phone is super nice for the price still working under the water the internet work fast and the camera with flash take the amazing pictures I recommend .
customer_reviews.author: luis veliz

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for a teenager. My son is on it from the time he wakes up until he goes to bed. He has had no issues with it and it is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L. Prouty

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my daughter and she really likes it at this time,. Learning more about it every day, she says..

customer_reviews.title: Worst Phone
customer_reviews.text: Awful....they didnt even send the Edge just the regular Hydro. All software was outdated and super slow, it constantly freezes
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Del Pezzo

customer_reviews.title: boosphone
customer_reviews.text: Its a good phones - does what I need it to do. Wish the speaker was better. Works fine though

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone, its everything I could want. I have all the apps I need and then some. Would recommend this phone to my friends.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was for my 15 yr old. This phone is awesome!!! I would buy it for my daughter too!!

product_meta.title: Kyocera Hydro Edge (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description: A little water? Bring it on. The Kyocera Hydro EDGE is built to survive your drops, splashes and spills.
feature_bullets: Android 4.1 Jelly Bean. Waterproof , 4.0 Inch Touchscreen Display
5.0 MP Camera with Flash + Video Camera
If the phone freezes please try a factory reset and also factory update the firmware on the phone
